(poor-amphibian [pooramphibian], pierce-resistant [pierceres], undead [undead], magic-being [magicbeing], inanimate [inanimate], need-not-eat [neednoteat], mindless [mind], forest-survival [forestsurvival], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: 2 misc
Unholy rites performed by the Carrion Lords have caused vines and roots to reanimate the bones of a dead bear, creating a carrion beast.
